title: (x) The "GiantCreative" font ? / condensed casual Clarendon w/ ball terminals - Sexsmith {Riccardo}
content:
Hi everybody,  
could anyone tell me what the font used in the [Giant Creative website](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819220700/http:/madebygiant.com/) ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819220700im_/http:/typophile.com/files/giantcreative-font_4457.gif)

Thanks by advance :)
